thread.section_title: Upad - The UK's largest online letting agent Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Upad - The UK's largest online letting agent | upad.co.uk
thread.title: Loisjoy Thurstun
thread.title_full: Upad - The UK's largest online letting agent reviewed by Loisjoy Thurstun

author: Loisjoy Thurstun
title: Loisjoy Thurstun
text:
Appearing on Rightmove and similar portals is what rents your property. For a fraction of agents fees ( which can also be repeated if your tenant likes your property and you) , you can get this exposure through Upad.
The fee is realistic and for 3 months you can advertise your property on the most viewed portals. If you want further help with referencing and contracts they also offer this art reasonable prices. I rented my property within a week so I throughly recommend them! This is also the service for people who want to meet and vet their tenants themselves.
